x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.question: OOB the integration between CSM and ITSM data and processes is ____________ a) automatic b) manually managed
Case or Account Escalation is an __________ process a) internal b) external
Which protocol does credential-less Discovery use? a) SNMP b) HTTP c) NMAP d) TCP
CSM can manage case assignment __________? a) manually b) automatically c) both

x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.answer: c) A record of financial information relating to a CI
x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.question: What are "Assets"? a) Non-discoverable hardware b) Discoverable hardware not classified as a CI c) A record of financial information relating to a CI d) A CI Class extended from cmdb_ci_hardware

What are the phases of discovery? a) Scanning, Classification, Identification, Exploration b) Port Scan, Categorization, Identification, Exploration c) Shazzam, Classification, Identification, Exploration d) Shazzam, Classification, Reconciliation, Probes and Patterns
What does MID Server stand for? a) Management, Instrumentation, and Discovery b) Monitoring, Instrumentation, and Discovery c) Maintenance Information Device d) Management Information Database
In which phase of Discovery does Application Dependency mapping take place? a) Port Scan b) Classification c) Identification d) Exploration

With ____________________, you can identify impacted customers who have not yet reported an issue and proactively create cases for these customers. a) Major Incident Management b) Problem Management c) Major Issue Management d) Incident Management
Which Workspace Experience works with UI Builder for configuration? a) CSM Agent Workspace b) CSM Configurable Workspace

x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.answer: a) Discovery Home > CI Schedules tab OR Discovery > Discovery Schedules > New
x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.question: What are the two methods for creating a Discovery Schedule? a) Discovery Home > CI Schedules tab OR Discovery > Discovery Schedules > New b) Discovery Home > CI Schedules tab c) Discovery > Discovery Schedules > New d) Discovery > Discovery Schedules > Quick Discovery
The key table introduced with Major Issue Management is? a) Major Incident b) Major Issue c) Major Problem d) Major Case
What is the common port number for HTTP? a) 443 b) 22 c) 135 d) 161

What are the benefits of Workspace Experiences? a) Improve agent productivity with new multi-tab user interface b) Access to contextual data in a single view c) Reduce case handling time d )Improve customer experience e) All of the above
Case escalations are managed by which persona? a) Account Escalation Manager b) Customer c) Consumer d) Customer Service Agent
All customer / consumer interactions should be managed through which record type? a) In take b) Incident c) Idea d) Case

x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.answer: b) an interim solution while credentials are created/provided
x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.question: What is the purpose of credential-less discovery? a) to Discover devices Security will not provide credentials for b) an interim solution while credentials are created/provided c) a more secure version of discovery as credentials are not stored d) a discovery solution using an agent on the target device
Which relationship type is added between an application and it's host? a) depends on b) used by c) runs on d) no relationship

x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.answer: b) a tool which uses defined criteria to recommend a best assignee for a case to a case manager
x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.question: What is the CSM Assignment Workbench? a) where agents can find their assigned cases b) a tool which uses defined criteria to recommend a best assignee for a case to a case manager c) a tool for estimating case effort d) a tool for recording time spent on an assignment
CIs that could not be classified show in which related list on the Discovery Schedule? a) ECC Queue b) Discovery Status c) Unidentified IPs d) Discovery Log

x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.answer: d) It allows communication between the instance and applications/devices within a local Network
x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.question: What is the purpose of a MID Server? a) It runs Discovery b) It interacts with Active Directory c) It produces schedules reports and sends them to Users d) It allows communication between the instance and applications/devices within a local Network
When are assets typically created? a) during procurement b) when a new CI is created c) when manually created d) all of the above
What kind of servers can a MID Server be installed on? a) Windows only b) UNIX only c) Windows and UNIX d) Virtual Servers only
Which port identifies a device as a Windows Device? a) 443 b) 22 c) 135 d) 161
Account escalations are managed by which persona? a) Account Escalation Manager b) Customer c) Consumer d) Customer Service Agent
Who should raise an ITSM ticket if Technical IT Support is required for a case? a) Customer b) Consumer c) IT Agent d) Customer Service Agent
Which method of assignment is preferred? a) manual b) automatic c) informed manual (assignment workbench)
Which Operating Systems does credential-less discovery work with? a) Windows Only b) Linux Only c) Windows and Linux d) Any Operating System
In Major Issue Management, affected customers are identified using? a) Target Communications b) Groups c) A List Field d) Roles
Which relationship type is added between interdependent applications identified by TCP ports? a) depends on b) used by c) runs on d) no relationship

Which phases of Discovery can be investigated in the ECC Queue related list on the Discovery Status record? a) Port Scan and Identification b) Identification and Classification c) Port Scan and Classification d) Classification and Exploration

x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.answer: Agent Workspace (com.agent_workspace) and/or CSM Workspace plugin (com.snc.agent_workspace.csm) is not installed and configured
x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.question: Customer Service Management plugin is installed and configured but agents cannot see the CSM Agent Workspace in the navigation. What is a likely cause of the issue?
SLAs can be related to case or account escalation records? a) True b) False
Applications are created from _____________ a) running processes b) registry keys c) install directories d) license information

x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.answer: a) On the MID Server "Related Links"
x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.question: Where do you enable Credential-less Discovery? a) On the MID Server "Related Links" b) On the Discovery Schedule c) In the MID Server config.xml file d) With system property sn_disco.credential_less_disco.enabled

x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.answer: d) so that agents can receive assignments in their Inbox in Agent Workspace
x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.question: Why is Agent Workspace required for Advanced Work Assignment to be used? a) it is a licensed product b) it isn't required c) so that agents can choose the assignments they want d) so that agents can receive assignments in their Inbox in Agent Workspace

Which phases of Discovery can be investigated in the Discovery Log related list on the Discovery Status record? a) Port Scan and Identification b) Identification and Classification c) Port Scan and Classification d) Identification and Exploration
What is the common port number for SMNP? a) 443 b) 22 c) 135 d) 161
Which role do users require as a minimum to create or manage CSM Agent Workspace Landing Pages? a) admin b) sn_customservice.admin c) itil d) workspace_admin
Upon closure of the major case, all child cases are? a) Resolved automatically b) Closed automatically c) Unchanged d) Update with notes automatically but remain open
External Customers / Consumers can be given read-only access to Incident, Change Request and Request records and the ability to approve or reject Change Requests or Requests. a) True b) False

x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.answer: b) The MID Server opens a persistent connection to the instance through the AMB Client and listens on the /mid/server/<mid_sys_id> AMB channel. When an output record is inserted into the Queue [ecc_queue] table, an AMB message is sent to the MID Server's channel. The MID Server receives this message and immediately polls the ecc_queue table for work.
x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.question: How does the MID Server receive instructions from the Instance? a) The instance uses a REST API to POST messages to the MID Server b) The MID Server opens a persistent connection to the instance through the AMB Client and listens on the /mid/server/<mid_sys_id> AMB channel. When an output record is inserted into the Queue [ecc_queue] table, an AMB message is sent to the MID Server's channel. The MID Server receives this message and immediately polls the ecc_queue table for work. c) A system administrator must batch work to send to the MID Server manually d) A system administrator must configure a custom scripted web service for the MID Server to use

What is the relationship between the roles sn_customerservice.escalation_requester and sn_customerservice.deescalation_requester? a) sn_customerservice.deescalation_requester contains sn_customerservice.escalation_requester b) sn_customerservice.escalation_requester contains sn_customerservice.deescalation_requester c) there is no relationship
_________ setting in Discovery Schedules scans devices without the use of credentials a) Configuration Items b) SNMP c) IP Addresses d) Cloud Infrastructure

x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.answer: a) If a discovered running process matches the criteria of a process classifier, a CI of that class will be created
x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.question: What do Process Classifiers do? a) If a discovered running process matches the criteria of a process classifier, a CI of that class will be created b) If a discovered running process matches the criteria of a process classifier, process details are updated by the classifier's script to improve identification and reconciliation

Which Advanced Work Assignment feature assigns tasks based on an agents history with a caller, their history with similar tasks or their position within the account team? a) Caller Affinity b) Agent Affinity c) User Affinity d) Assignment Affinity

x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.answer: b) Inside the Firewall and on a server as close to the MID Server's "targets" as possible
x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.question: What is the best practice when choosing the location to install a MID Server? a) Inside the Firewall and on a server with the most available resource b) Inside the Firewall and on a server as close to the MID Server's "targets" as possible c) Inside the Firewall and on a physical server d) Inside the Firewall and on a virtual server

x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.answer: b) Active, Order, Roles OR Assignment Group
x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.question: Which properties of a landing page define the visibility of a landing page to an agent? a) Active, Order, User Criteria b) Active, Order, Roles OR Assignment Group c) Active, Order, Condition Builder
What is the common port number for SSH? a) 443 b) 22 c) 135 d) 161
Which role is required to approve a Major Issue Candidate? a) sn_customerservice_agent b) itil c) sn_customerservice_manager or sn_majorissue_mgt.major_issue_manager d) approve_user

x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.answer: c) When it is configured and all Credentials fail
x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.question: Under what circumstances does Credential-less Discovery run? a) Every time when it is configured b) When schedules marked for Credential-less Discovery run c) When it is configured and all Credentials fail d) When it is part of a running probe or pattern
Which roles should CSM Agents be given to create Incidents on behalf of their customers / consumers? a) itil b) itil_admin c) incident_manager d) sn_incident_read and sn_incident_write

x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.answer: c) Verify Contact or Verify Consumer
x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.question: Which Workspace feature can agents use to find a user/consumer and verify their identity? a) Global Search b) Password Reset c) Verify Contact or Verify Consumer d) User Surveys

x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.answer: b) If a discovered running process matches the criteria of a process handler, process details are updated by the handler's script to improve identification and reconciliation
x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.question: What do Process Handlers do? a) If a discovered running process matches the criteria of a process handler, a CI of that class will be created b) If a discovered running process matches the criteria of a process handler, process details are updated by the handler's script to improve identification and reconciliation
MID Server applications running on UNIX Servers can interact with targets running a Windows OS? a) True b) False

x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.answer: a) The device responded and at least one port is open
x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.question: When is a host described as "Alive"? a) The device responded and at least one port is open b) The device responded but not ports are detected c) The device responded and all ports scanned are open d) The device responded and at least one port is open and the credentials used are correct
Where can managers see details of Advanced Work Assignment Agent workloads? a) Agent Workspace b) Service Desk > My Groups Work c) The Task list d) AWA Operations Dashboard

x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.answer: a) A probe which scans available ports on a host
x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.question: What is Shazzam? a) A probe which scans available ports on a host b) An agent which is installed on the host c) A set of credentials for Windows devices d) A set of Behaviors
Which role is required to propose a Major Issue Candidate? a) sn_customerservice_agent or sn_customerservice.consumer_agent b) itil c) sn_customerservice_manager d) approve_user
An escalation template defines? a) type. Case or Account b) if approval is required c) the escalation watchlist d) all of the above
What does Advancement Work Assignment use to group work items together? a) Queues b) Work Groups c) Assignment Groups d) Inbound Actions
MID Server applications running on Windows Servers can interact with targets running non-Windows OS? a) True b) False
In Agent Workspace chat, preconfigured and admin configured actions can be set up. These are called ________________ ? a) notification templates b) canned messages c) quick actions d) chat templates

What defines the severity level for escalation and color used to highlight escalated cases or account records in the user interface? a) severity b) escalation severity c) priority d) escalation priority

x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.answer: a) How many ports the Shazzam probe will scan before starting to classify
x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.question: What does Shazzam probe batch size control? a) How many ports the Shazzam probe will scan before starting to classify b) How many Shazzam probes are sent c) How many Shazzam batches are sent d) How many responses Shazzam waits for before starting to classify
Process Classifiers and Process Handlers are updated via the CI Class Manager? a) True b) False

x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.answer: c) The Case remains as a regular case
x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.question: What happens to Major Issue Candidates that are rejected? a) The Major Case is set to "Rejected" b) The Case is set to "Rejected" c) The Case remains as a regular case d) A Rejected Major Case is created

x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.answer: d) No open ports are detected or no ports responded to the port scan
x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.question: When is a host described as inactive? a) The device responded and at least one port is open b) The device responded but not ports are detected c) The device responded and all ports scanned are open d) No open ports are detected or no ports responded to the port scan

x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.answer: b) preconfigured messages that pull data from related Task [task] records
x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.question: In Agent Chat "Response Templates" are? a) playbooks for handling cases b) preconfigured messages that pull data from related Task [task] records c) templates for records in the Response [rm_response] table d) all of the above

x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.answer:
c) Name
N.B. The value of the name may be an IP Address as Credential-less Discovery uses reverse DNS lookup
x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.question: Which CI identifier is used for reconciliation in Credential-less Discovery? a) MAC Address b) IP Address c) Name d) Install Directory
CI Identifiers are updated via the CI Class Manager? a) True b) False

x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.answer: b) the user the MID Server uses to login to the instance
x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.question: What is the "MID Server User"? a) the user the instance uses to login to the MID Server b) the user the MID Server uses to login to the instance c) the user the MID Server uses to login to Targets d) the user responsible for configuring the MID Server
What is the default Shazzam batch size? a) 25 b) 2500 c) 500 d) 1000

x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.answer: b) It is added to the new Major Case as a child case
x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.question: When a Major Case candidate has an Account or Contact/Consumer defined, what happens to the Candidate when it is approved? a) It is set to Approved b) It is added to the new Major Case as a child case c) It is converted to a Major Case d) It is converted to a Major Incident

x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.answer: b) when an escalation record is created with state "Requested"
x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.question: When is the escalation approval flow triggered? a) when the escalation template says approval is required b) when an escalation record is created with state "Requested" c) when triggered by the customer service agent d) it will never run

x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.answer: a) Requested, Escalated, De-escalation Requested, Closed, Rejected
x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.question: What are the state values of Escalation records: a) Requested, Escalated, De-escalation Requested, Closed, Rejected b) New, Escalated, Closed, Rejected c) Requested, Escalated, De-escalated, Rejected d) Requested, Escalated, De-escalated, Closed
Where are Discovery Credentials stored? a) On the MID Server b) On the target host c) On the instance d) Credentials must be provided on each discovery run
When sending a long email to a user, agents may like to use which feature of the Workspace email client? a) full-screen mode b) quick messages c) cc d) request approval

x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.answer: c) It is converted to a Major Case
x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.question: When a Major Case candidate does not have an Account or Contact/Consumer defined, what happens to the Candidate when it is approved? a) It is set to Approved b) It is added to the new Major Case as a child case c) It is converted to a Major Case d) It is converted to a Major Incident

What is a possible cause of "No results returned from probe" warning message? a) Firewall with advanced security configured b) File and Printer Sharing Inbound Rules are not enabled for ICMP c) both a and b
Which Role must the MID Server User have? a) admin b) itil c) mid_server d) rest_explorer
Credentials are encrypted with which algorithm? a) Base64 b) SHA c) AES128 d) RSA

In CSM Agent Workspace where can agents preview sent and received emails? a) Agent Assist tab b) Using the "Preview Emails" UI Actions c) only if the "Emails Preview" component is included in the landing page d) Related lists

What are the requirements for the Service Account which runs the MID Server application? a) It must not be a local system account b) It must not be an administrator level account (local, domain, etc.) c) It must have the "log on as service" right d) all of the above
What are discovered computers classified by? a) Functionality b) Serial Number c) Processor d) Operating System

x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.answer: a) a contextual list of relevant records based on the current cases context or playbook activity
x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.question: In CSM Configurable Workspace, dynamic related records provide agents with? a) a contextual list of relevant records based on the current cases context or playbook activity b) a list of tasks that are either the cases parent or child c) a list of knowledge articles related to this case d) an escalation path for this case

When a credential is successful on a device a __________ is created and the same credential will be used first next time the device is discovered. a) Alias b) Affinity c) Connection d) Basic Auth Profile
Which version of PowerShell is required for the MID Server to run? a) 2.1 b) 3.1 c) 4.1 d) 5.1

x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.answer:
a) Functionality
Eg. Power, Print, Switch, Route
x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.question: What are discovered network devices classified by? a) Functionality b) Serial Number c) Processor d) Operating System

x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.answer: a) define which credentials to use for a specific schedule
x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.question: In Discovery Credential Aliases are used to: a) define which credentials to use for a specific schedule b) obfuscate the credentials from the Discovery Administrator c) exclude credentials from a discovery schedule d) give credentials a user friendly name

Which ServiceNow feature "provides a framework for improving the visualization of customer information for agents across multiple interactions and record types"? a) User profiles b) HR Profiles c) Live Profiles d) Customer Central

x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.answer: c) create the system property glide.discovery.debug.classification and set it to true
x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.question: How can you log classification criteria/attributes during discovery? a) configure it on the Discovery Schedule b) configure it on Discovery Home c) create the system property glide.discovery.debug.classification and set it to true d) create the MID Server property glide.discovery.debug.classification and set it to true
Where can CI Identifiers be configured? a) Discovery Patterns b) System Properties c) CI Class Manager d) MID Server Properties

If a Credential Alias is defined for a Discovery Schedule and a device found in the Schedule also has an Affinity, which credential is used? a) all Credentials in order based on the device class b) the Credential Alias c) the Affinity Credential d) the selected Basic Auth Profile

Which ServiceNow feature "enables managers to regularly monitor and coach agents during specific customer interactions."? a) Google Analytics b) Conversation History c) Conversation Monitoring d) Chat Log

x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.answer: c) set system property glide.identification_engine.multisource_enabled to true
x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.question: How can you enable Multi-Source CMDB? a) enable Multi-Source CMDB plugin b) it is enabled by default c) set system property glide.identification_engine.multisource_enabled to true d) configure it on the MID Server

x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.answer: c) Discovery Log on Discovery Status
x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.question: Where can authentication errors during discovery be found? a) System Log b) Node Log c) Discovery Log on Discovery Status d) ECC Queue on Discovery Status

x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.answer: a) a feature allowing agents and managers to communicate without the customer/consumer seeing their conversation
x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.question: What is "Agent Whisper"? a) a feature allowing agents and managers to communicate without the customer/consumer seeing their conversation b) a quick action to drop the volume of agent audio c) an Agent Community for tips and tricks d) a delicious chocolate bar
An available OOB chat quick action is? a) drop chat b) escalate to P1 c) transfer to another queue d) ask for approval
What Credential Type do you need to access UNIX systems? a) SSH b) SSL c) WMI d) CIM
When Multi-Source CMDB is enabled, it is possible to see all data from each source in cmdb_multisource_data table a) True b) False
Which type of credential can you provide either a Password or a Private Key for? a) UNIX b) WMI c) CIM d) SSH

You can view Multi-source CMDB data: a) by clicking "Preview Data" on the Reconciliation Rules in CI Class Manager b) by clicking "Multisource Data Preview" under Related Links on a CI record c) in the related list "Multisource Data" on a CI record d) all of the above

What dictates which identification and exploration probes and patterns are triggered? a) The Shazzam probe results b) The CI's Classification c) Reconciliation Rules d) Multi-source CMDB Configuration
What privileges must an SSH User be granted on the target system? a) Admin b) Root or Sudo c) Domain Admin d) System

x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.answer:
c) Discovery Configuration Console
N.B. Behaviors control which ports are scanned when applied to specific Discovery Schedules. To configure which ports are scanned, regardless of Behaviors being applied use the Discovery Configuration Console.
x_185616_flsh_crds_flash_card.question: Where can Administrators globally configure which ports Shazzam will scan? a) Behaviors b) Discovery Schedules c) Discovery Configuration Console d) System Properties
If credentials are stored externally in an organizations password locker, what must be provided for each credential? a) Credential URL b) Credential ID c) Password Locker d) Encoding
What kind of credential will be required to discover devices such as Routers, Switches and Printers? a) WMI b) CIM c) VMWare d) SNMP
SNMP Community Credentials only require a _____________ a) Username b) Password c) Private Key d) Credential ID
Behaviors are selected on which record type? a) Discovery Status b) MID Server c) Discovery Schedule d) Functionality Definiton
Behaviors define which Port Probes Shazzam should deploy? a) True b) False
Behaviors define which MID Servers to use? a) True b) False
